item.description: Meet women who are free on weekdays for lunch and Scrabble. We will meet at Bertucci's at the Mall at Rockingham Park in Salem, NH for lunch at 11:30. After lunch we will go to "Field of Dreams" also in Salem for an outdoor game of Scrabble. If you are available on weekdays, please join us.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Lunch and Scrabble
